trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en samling av <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> objekter.

trans-unit.source: The DesignerActionListCollection class represents the aggregation of all the items in a smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: Klassen DesignerActionListCollection representerer aggregasjonen alle elementene i en smart koden panelet.

trans-unit.source: The DesignerActionListCollection class contains zero or more <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> objects.
trans-unit.target: Klassen DesignerActionListCollection inneholder null eller flere <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>objekter.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>

trans-unit.source: Each of these lists contains zero or more objects that represent the actual items in the panel and are derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem> class.
trans-unit.target: Hvert enkelt av disse listene inneholder null eller flere objekter som representerer faktiske elementene i panelet og er avledet fra <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem>klassen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the two techniques for supplying a DesignerActionListCollection to populate the panel with items for components, including custom controls.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser to metoder for å oppgi en DesignerActionListCollection for å fylle ut panelet med elementer komponenter, inkludert egendefinerte kontroller.

trans-unit.source: |Technique|Description| |---------------|-----------------| |Pull model|The designer for the component class, which is derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner> class, supplies this collection through the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: | Metoden | Beskrivelse | |---------------|-----------------| | Pull modellen | Designer for component-klassen som er avledet fra den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner>klasse, leverer samlingen via den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The designer infrastructure reads this property when it must display the panel.| |Push model|A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> or DesignerActionListCollection is supplied as a parameter in a call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> associated with the component.| The designer infrastructure constructs a panel by creating a smart tag panel, whose constructor takes two parameters of type DesignerActionListCollection.
trans-unit.target: Spørringsutformer infrastrukturen leser denne egenskapen når den må viser panelet. | | Push modellen | En <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>eller DesignerActionListCollection er angitt som en parameter i et kall til <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A>metoden for <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>knyttet til komponenten. | Spørringsutformer infrastruktur bygger et panel ved å opprette et smartkort koden panel, der konstruktøren tar to parametere av typen DesignerActionListCollection.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>

trans-unit.source: The collections of lists, which contain the pulled and pushed items, are merged into one panel.
trans-unit.target: Samlinger med lister, som inneholder elementene trukket og pushed, er slått sammen til én panelet.

trans-unit.source: Because it derives from the <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase?displayProperty=fullName> class, DesignerActionListCollection uses an internal <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> to store its collection of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> objects.
trans-unit.target: Fordi det avledes fra de <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase?displayProperty=fullName>klassen DesignerActionListCollection bruker en intern <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>til å lagre samlingen <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>objekter.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> </xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> class with default settings.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref> klassen med standardinnstillinger.

trans-unit.source: The DesignerActionListCollection constructor creates an empty collection, containing zero <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> objects.
trans-unit.target: Konstruktøren DesignerActionListCollection oppretter en tom samling som inneholder null <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>objekter.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> class with the specified panel items.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref> klassen med de angitte elementene.

trans-unit.source: The DesignerActionListCollection constructor creates a collection that contains the supplied <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> objects.
trans-unit.target: Konstruktøren DesignerActionListCollection oppretter en samling som inneholder den angitte <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>objekter.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>

trans-unit.source: The array of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> objects to populate the collection.
trans-unit.target: En rekke <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> objekter til å fylle samlingen.

trans-unit.source: value is .
trans-unit.target: valueis .

trans-unit.source: Adds the supplied <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> to the current collection.
trans-unit.target: Legger til den angitte <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> til gjeldende samling.

trans-unit.source: The new element is added to the end of the internal list.
trans-unit.target: Det nye elementet legges til slutten av listen internt.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> to add.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> to add.

trans-unit.source: The position into which the new element is inserted into the collection's internal list.
trans-unit.target: Posisjonen som det nye objektet settes inn i samlingens intern liste.

trans-unit.source: Adds the elements of the supplied <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> array to the end of the current collection.
trans-unit.target: Legger til elementer i den angitte <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> matrisen til slutten av gjeldende samling.

trans-unit.source: The new elements are added to the end of the internal list.
trans-unit.target: De nye elementene legges til slutten av listen internt.

trans-unit.source: After validating the `value` parameter, the AddRange method makes a series of calls to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection.Add%2A> method to individually add each element.
trans-unit.target: Etter validering av `value` parameteren metoden AddRange gjør en rekke kall til den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection.Add%2A>metode for å legge til hvert element enkeltvis.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: The array of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> objects to add.
trans-unit.target: En rekke <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> objekter for å legge til.

trans-unit.source: value is .
trans-unit.target: valueis .

trans-unit.source: Adds the elements of the supplied <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> to the end of the current collection.
trans-unit.target: Legger til elementer i den angitte <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref> til slutten av gjeldende samling.

trans-unit.source: The new elements are added to the end of the internal list.
trans-unit.target: De nye elementene legges til slutten av listen internt.

trans-unit.source: After validating the `value` parameter, the AddRangemethod makes a series of calls to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection.Add%2A> method to individually add each element.
trans-unit.target: Etter validering av `value` parameteren AddRangemethod foretar en rekke kall til den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection.Add%2A>metode for å legge til hvert element enkeltvis.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> to add.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> to add.

trans-unit.source: value is .
trans-unit.target: valueis .

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the collection contains a specific value.
trans-unit.target: Angir om samlingen inneholder en bestemt verdi.

trans-unit.source: A match is determined by value, not identity, comparison.
trans-unit.target: En samsvarende er avhengig av verdien ikke identitet, sammenligningen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> to search for.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> til å søke etter.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the collection contains the specified value; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis samlingen inneholder den angitte verdien. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the current collection into the supplied array, starting at the specified array index.
trans-unit.target: Kopier av elementene i den gjeldende samlingen i den angitte matrisen, med Start fra angitte matriseindeksen.

trans-unit.source: If the CopyTo method throws an exception while copying, the state of the destination array is undefined.
trans-unit.target: Hvis metoden CopyTo oppstår det et unntak under kopiering, er tilstanden til Målmatrisen ikke definert.

trans-unit.source: For example, if an <xref:System.ArgumentException> or <xref:System.InvalidCastException> occurs, the destination array may be left in a partially filled state.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis en <xref:System.ArgumentException>eller <xref:System.InvalidCastException>oppstår, Målmatrisen bli værende i en delvis fylt tilstand.</xref:System.InvalidCastException> </xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional array of type <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> that is the destination of the elements copied from the current collection.
trans-unit.target: Type endimensjonal matrise <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> som er målet for elementene kopieres fra gjeldende samling.

trans-unit.source: The array must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: Matrisen må ha nullbasert indeksering.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in `array` at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen i `array` som kopiering begynner.

trans-unit.source: array is .
trans-unit.target: arrayis .

trans-unit.source: index is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: indexer mindre enn 0.

trans-unit.source: array is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: arrayer flerdimensjonal.

trans-unit.source: -or- The number of elements in the current collection is greater than the available space from index to the end of the destination array.
trans-unit.target: - eller - antallet elementer i den gjeldende samlingen er større enn den tilgjengelige plassen fra index til slutten av Målmatrisen.

trans-unit.source: A problem occurred casting the elements of the current collection to the type of the destination array, perhaps as the result of a failed downcast.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstod et problem endring av elementene i samlingen gjeldende for typen Målmatrisen, kanskje som et resultat av en mislykket downcast.

trans-unit.source: Determines the index of a specific item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer indeksen for et bestemt element i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Internally, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> class uses a <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName> to contain its collection of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> objects.
trans-unit.target: Internt i <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>klasse bruker en <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName>inneholder samlingen av <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>objekter.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> to locate in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> ikke i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The index of value if found in the internal list; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for value Hvis funnet i listen interne; ellers, -1.

trans-unit.source: Inserts the supplied <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> into the collection at the specified position.
trans-unit.target: Setter inn den angitte <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> i samlingen fra den angitte posisjonen.

trans-unit.source: If the `index` parameter is equal to the value of the <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A> property, the new element is added to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den `index` parameteren er lik verdien for den <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>egenskapen nye elementet legges til slutten av samlingen.</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: Internally, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> class uses a <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName> to contain its collection of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> objects.
trans-unit.target: Internt i <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>klasse bruker en <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName>inneholder samlingen av <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>objekter.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>

trans-unit.source: Because lists maintain contiguous elements, the elements that follow the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element.
trans-unit.target: Fordi lister beholde sammenhengende elementer, Flytt elementene som følger pekeren ned å gi plass til det nye objektet.

trans-unit.source: This rearrangement changes the index of the elements after the insertion point.
trans-unit.target: Denne omorganisering endrer indeksen for elementene etter pekeren.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which `value` should be inserted.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen som `value` skal settes inn.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> to insert into the collection.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> å sette inn i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: index is less than 0 or greater than the count of elements in the current collection.
trans-unit.target: indexer mindre enn 0 eller større enn antallet elementer i den gjeldende samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir elementet i den angitte indeksen.

trans-unit.source: Setting an element to `null` causes a design-time exception to be thrown when the smart tag panel is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Når det angis et element `null` forårsaker en utformingen unntak til å bli utløst når smart koden panelet vises.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for elementet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> i den angitte indeksen.

trans-unit.source: Performs additional custom processes when clearing the contents of the <xref href="System.Collections.CollectionBase"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Utfører flere egendefinerte prosesser under fjerning av innholdet i den <xref href="System.Collections.CollectionBase"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Performs additional custom processes before inserting a new element into the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Utfører flere egendefinerte prosesser før du setter inn et nytt element i den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which to insert `value`.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen som skal settes inn `value`.

trans-unit.source: The new value of the element at `index`.
trans-unit.target: Den nye verdien for elementet i `index`.

trans-unit.source: Performs additional custom processes when removing an element from the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Utfører flere egendefinerte prosesser når du fjerner et element fra den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which `value` can be found.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen som `value` finnes.

trans-unit.source: The value of the element to remove from `index`.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for elementet til å fjerne fra `index`.

trans-unit.source: Performs additional custom processes before setting a value in the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Utfører flere egendefinerte prosesser før du angir en verdi den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which `oldValue` can be found.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen som `oldValue` finnes.

trans-unit.source: The value to replace with `newValue`.
trans-unit.target: Verdien du vil erstatte med `newValue`.

trans-unit.source: The new value of the element at `index`.
trans-unit.target: Den nye verdien for elementet i `index`.

trans-unit.source: Performs additional custom processes when validating a value.
trans-unit.target: Utfører flere egendefinerte prosesser når du validerer en verdi.

trans-unit.source: The object to validate.
trans-unit.target: Objektet til å validere.

trans-unit.source: Removes the first occurrence of a specific <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner den første forekomsten av en bestemt <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> fra samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Internally, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> class uses a <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName> to contain its collection of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> objects.
trans-unit.target: Internt i <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>klasse bruker en <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName>inneholder samlingen av <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>objekter.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>

trans-unit.source: Since lists maintain contiguous elements, the elements that follow the removal point move up to occupy the vacated spot.
trans-unit.target: Siden lister beholde sammenhengende elementer, Flytt elementene som følger fjerning punktet opp skal ha vacated punktet.

trans-unit.source: This rearrangement changes the index of the elements after the removal point.
trans-unit.target: Denne omorganisering endrer indeksen for elementene etter fjerning av punktet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> to remove from the current collection.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> fjerne fra gjeldende samling.
